survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how air quality in office environments affects employee productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the air quality in your current workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the air quality in your current workspace?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any health issues related to poor air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-ended follow-up for 'Yes' respondents to specify issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any health issues related to poor air quality in your workspace?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q2, please describe the health issues you experienced.
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to elaborate on their health issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q2, please describe the health issues you experienced.

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality improvements would you find most beneficial in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections as respondents may value several improvements.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality improvements would you find most beneficial in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often does your employer measure or assess air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: This helps gauge employer awareness and action on air quality.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often does your employer measure or assess air quality in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Does poor air quality affect your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to capture varying degrees of impact.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Does poor air quality affect your productivity at work?

questions.question_text: Have you ever requested improvements to air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Follow-up with open-ended question for 'Yes' responses to detail actions taken.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Have you ever requested improvements to air quality in your workspace?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q7, what actions were taken in response to your request?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question captures the effectiveness of employee requests.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q7, what actions were taken in response to your request?

questions.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily work in?
questions.client_notes: Understanding workspace type can help correlate air quality perceptions with physical environment.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily work in?

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in Q9, please specify your workspace type.
questions.client_notes: This ensures clarity for atypical workspace types.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in Q9, please specify your workspace type.

questions.question_text: How important is air quality to your overall job satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: This helps prioritize air quality in employee satisfaction initiatives.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How important is air quality to your overall job satisfaction?

questions.question_text: Would you consider changing jobs due to poor air quality in your current workspace?
questions.client_notes: This measures the severity of air quality's impact on employee retention.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Would you consider changing jobs due to poor air quality in your current workspace?

questions.question_text: What additional comments or suggestions do you have regarding air quality in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question captures any unaddressed concerns or ideas.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What additional comments or suggestions do you have regarding air quality in your workspace?
